translations: v．开脱，使无罪：证明某人无罪或免除某人的责任。
· The evidence exculpates the defendant from any wrongdoing.
证据证明被告没有任何不当行为。

sentences.sentence: Philanthropy no more canonises the good businessman than it exculpates the bad.
sentences.translation: 慈善更多是为坏商人开脱，而非为好商人歌功颂德。

sentences.sentence: Philanthropy no more canonises the good businessman than it exculpates the bad.
sentences.translation: 慈善现在既不能使好人显得神圣，也不会为坏人洗脱罪名。
